name: Kokomeron
description:
Kokomeron is a horror game developed by Maphatar Animation Studio. It's currently available on Android. And we're also aiming for PC & IOS release (sooner or later).

The game starts in the middle of the night in a town surrounded by walls. Martin, who just got into town, was tasked to buy some condiments by his mother, but to get out, he must unlock the four gates on each side of the town in proper order.

It was easier said than done until he found something peculiar far from the reach of his light.

--

Hi-ho! We like to thank everyone for playing our game. The time, interest, and effort you gave for our game are truly remarkable and inspiring. And it's more than enough to keep us pushing on to design & build new games for the Gaming Community.

But If you wish to support us further, you can buy our merch via our selected online stores - Shopee & Lazada. You can also support us via our Patreon page.

Your continuous support helps us grow and improve our services. We, the Developers & Artists of Maphatar, are truly grateful for your actions.

Support Us: Maphatar
